title: AU Political Affairs
subtitle:
Africa is home to over 25.2m forcibly displaced persons, made up of 7.4m refugees and 17.8m Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs).

This year's High Level Dialogue, will be about finding durable solutions to forced displacement on the continent.
